definitions.definition: Of something or someone that listens .
examples: Any listening person can tell she's lying.

definitions.definition: Of something that is used in order to hear or to improve the ability to hear.
examples: He could hear better when he used his listening device.

definitions.definition: Of an action that is performed with caution and attention to sounds.

main_definition: Of something or someone that listens .
secondary_definitions: Of something that is used in order to hear or to improve the ability to hear.
Of an action that is performed with caution and attention to sounds.
